name: Halo Small Business Solutions
tag_list: credit-card-processing, payroll-processing, ecommerce, business-financing, consulting, marketing, website-design, seo, business-cash-advance, merchant-cash-advance, equipment-financing, equipment-leasing, ar-factoring, ar-financing, accounts-receivable-fi
overview:
Our management team is comprised of business owners allowing Halo Small Business Solutions to understand the complexities of managing and growing a small to medium-sized business. Halo Small Business Solutions staff members are highly qualified in their designated areas and utilize their extensive expertise to customize services for your specific business needs.

We will help you achieve your business goals at a price point that is extremely competitive. Rather than deal with multiple service providers, Halo Small Business Solutions offers a single-source provider for all aspects of your business. Our team of dedicated experts will satisfy all of your business requirements including; Credit Card Processing, Payroll Processing, Business Cash Advance, Accounts Receivable Financing, Equipment Financing, VoIP Service, Internet Service, Website Design, Brand Design, Marketing Services, Search Engine Optimization, and Social Media Management.

milestones.description: Halo Small Business Solutions is now a registered ISO/MSP of FNBO
